'''Gray Crystals''' are an [[Exploration]] mechanic found in [[Girdle of the Sands]], [[Sumeru]]. The power of [[Khvarena]] can be used to "melt" these crystals, revealing what is encased within.

==Trivia==
* Though Gray Crystal is meant to seal [[Abyss|Abyssal]] creatures, other creatures can also become trapped (e.g., the [[Wenut]] in the [[Gate of Zulqarnain]] area).
